author: Alex Kammerling
description: This sweet dessert cocktail tastes just like mum's home-made apple pie with cream.
name: Apple Strudel (by Alex Kammerling)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur
15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Carefully FLOAT cream by pouring over the back of a spoon
